sample_conversation.content: Hi! Thanks for reaching out to GrowEasy Real Estate. I'd be happy to help you find the perfect property. To get started, could you let me know which location you're interested in?
Great! Bhubaneswar is a wonderful area. Could you tell me what type of property you're interested in? Are you looking for an Apartment, Villa, Plot, or Commercial property?
Perfect! Villa properties are in good demand. Could you share your budget range in lakhs?
Thank you! A budget of â‚¹100 lakhs gives us good options. When are you planning to make the purchase?
Excellent! You seem like a serious buyer. Let me connect you with our senior property consultant who can show you the best options in your budget and timeline.
